typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		profession_code as string,
		profession_rank_code as string,
		licensure_number as string,
		licensure_status as string,
		licensure_activity_status as string,
		original_licensure_date as string,
		expiration_date as string,
		status_effective_date as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		administrative_complaints_found as string,
		emerg_suspension_restrict_orders as string,
		final_orders_found as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FloridaData
source(output(
		national_provider_identifier as string,
		entity_type_code as string,
		replacement_npi as string,
		employer_identification_number as string,
		legal_business_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		name_prefix as string,
		name_suffix as string,
		credential as string,
		provider_other_organization_name as string,
		provider_other_organization_name_type_code as string,
		last_name_other as string,
		first_name_other as string,
		middle_name_other as string,
		name_prefix_other as string,
		name_suffix_other as string,
		credential_other as string,
		other_last_name_type_code as string,
		business_mailing_address_line1 as string,
		business_mailing_address_line2 as string,
		business_mailing_address_city as string,
		business_mailing_address_state as string,
		business_mailing_address_postal_code as string,
		business_mailing_address_country_code as string,
		business_mailing_address_phone as string,
		business_mailing_address_fax as string,
		practice_location_address_line1 as string,
		practice_location_address_line2 as string,
		practice_location_address_city as string,
		practice_location_address_state as string,
		practice_location_address_postal_code as string,
		practice_location_address_country_code as string,
		practice_location_address_phone as string,
		practice_location_address_fax as string,
		provider_enumeration_date as string,
		last_update_date as string,
		npi_deactivation_reason_code as string,
		npi_deactivation_date as string,
		npi_reactivation_date as string,
		gender as string,
		authorized_official_last_name as string,
		authorized_official_first_name as string,
		authorized_official_middle_name as string,
		authorized_official_title_or_position as string,
		authorized_official_telephone_number as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_1 as string,
		provider_license_number_1 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_1 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_1 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_2 as string,
		provider_license_number_2 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_2 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_2 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_3 as string,
		provider_license_number_3 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_3 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_3 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_4 as string,
		provider_license_number_4 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_4 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_4 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_5 as string,
		provider_license_number_5 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_5 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_5 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_6 as string,
		provider_license_number_6 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_6 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_6 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_7 as string,
		provider_license_number_7 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_7 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_7 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_8 as string,
		provider_license_number_8 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_8 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_8 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_9 as string,
		provider_license_number_9 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_9 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_9 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_10 as string,
		provider_license_number_10 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_10 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_10 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_11 as string,
		provider_license_number_11 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_11 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_11 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_12 as string,
		provider_license_number_12 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_12 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_12 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_13 as string,
		provider_license_number_13 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_13 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_13 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_14 as string,
		provider_license_number_14 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_14 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_14 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_15 as string,
		provider_license_number_15 as string,
		provider_license_number_state_code_15 as string,
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch_15 as string,
		is_sole_proprietor as string,
		is_organization_subpart as string,
		parent_organization_lbn as string,
		parent_organization_tin as string,
		authorized_official_name_prefix_text as string,
		authorized_official_name_suffix_text as string,
		authorized_official_credential_text as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_1 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_2 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_3 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_4 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_5 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_6 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_7 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_8 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_9 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_10 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_11 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_12 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_13 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_14 as string,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_group_15 as string,
		certification_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> NPPESData
source(output(
		npi as string,
		pac_id as string,
		last_name as string,
		first_name as string,
		apm_affiliation_1 as string,
		apm_affiliation_2 as string,
		apm_affiliation_3 as string,
		apm_affiliation_4 as string,
		measure_code as string,
		measure_title as string,
		inverse_measure as string,
		attestation_value as string,
		measure_performance_rate as string,
		denominator_count as string,
		collection_type as string,
		reported_on_pc_live_site as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> PhysicianCompare2017
source(output(
		npi as string,
		pac_id as string,
		professional_enrollment_id as string,
		last_name as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		credential as string,
		medical_school_name as string,
		graduation_year as string,
		primary_specialty as string,
		secondary_specialty_1 as string,
		secondary_specialty_2 as string,
		secondary_specialty_3 as string,
		secondary_specialty_4 as string,
		all_secondary_specialties as string,
		organization_legal_name as string,
		group_practice_pac_id as string,
		number_of_group_practice_members as string,
		line_1_street_address as string,
		line_2_street_address as string,
		marker_of_address_line_2_suppression as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		zip_code as string,
		phone_number as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_1 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_1 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_2 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_2 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_3 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_3 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_4 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_4 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_5 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_5 as string,
		professional_accepts_medicare_assignment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> PhysicianCompareAll
source(output(
		national_provider_identifier as string,
		last_name_organization_name_of_the_provider as string,
		first_name_of_the_provider as string,
		middle_initial_of_the_provider as string,
		credentials_of_the_provider as string,
		gender_of_the_provider as string,
		entity_type_of_the_provider as string,
		street_address_1_of_the_provider as string,
		street_address_2_of_the_provider as string,
		city_of_the_provider as string,
		zip_code_of_the_provider as string,
		state_code_of_the_provider as string,
		country_code_of_the_provider as string,
		provider_type as string,
		medicare_participation_indicator as string,
		place_of_service as string,
		hcpcs_code as string,
		hcpcs_description as string,
		hcpcs_drug_indicator as string,
		number_of_services as string,
		number_of_medicare_beneficiaries as string,
		number_of_distinct_medicare_beneficiary_per_day_services as string,
		average_medicare_allowed_amount as string,
		average_submitted_charge_amount as string,
		average_medicare_payment_amount as string,
		average_medicare_standardized_amount as string,
		year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Procs
FloridaData select(mapColumn(
		licensure_status,
		first_name,
		middle_name,
		last_name,
		licensure_activity_status,
		expiration_date,
		status_effective_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFL
NPPESData select(mapColumn(
		national_provider_identifier,
		last_name,
		first_name,
		middle_name,
		practice_location_address_state
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNPPES
SelectFL filter(not(isNull(licensure_status))) ~> FilterFL
SelectNPPES filter(case(practice_location_address_state == 'FL', true()) || case(practice_location_address_state == 'FLORIDA (FL)', true()) || case(practice_location_address_state == 'FLORIDA', true())) ~> FilterNPPES
FLUpper, NPPESUpper join(FLUpper@first_name == NPPESUpper@first_name
	&& FLUpper@middle_name == NPPESUpper@middle_name
	&& FLUpper@last_name == NPPESUpper@last_name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinFLNPPES
FilterFL derive(first_name = upper(first_name),
		middle_name = upper(middle_name),
		last_name = upper(last_name)) ~> FLUpper
FilterNPPES derive(first_name = upper(first_name),
		middle_name = upper(middle_name),
		last_name = upper(last_name)) ~> NPPESUpper
PhysicianCompare2017 derive(year = '2017') ~> AddYearColumn
PhysicianCompareAll select(mapColumn(
		npi,
		credential,
		medical_school_name,
		graduation_year,
		primary_specialty,
		all_secondary_specialties,
		organization_legal_name,
		number_of_group_practice_members,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_1,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_1,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_2,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_2,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_3,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_3,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_4,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_4,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_5,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_5,
		professional_accepts_medicare_assignment
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAllAff
AddYearColumn select(mapColumn(
		npi,
		apm_affiliation_1,
		apm_affiliation_2,
		apm_affiliation_3,
		apm_affiliation_4,
		attestation_value,
		measure_performance_rate,
		denominator_count,
		year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPC2017
JoinFLNPPES, SelectAllAff join(national_provider_identifier == npi,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinNppesFLAllPC
Procs select(mapColumn(
		national_provider_identifier,
		gender_of_the_provider,
		entity_type_of_the_provider,
		provider_type,
		hcpcs_code,
		hcpcs_description,
		hcpcs_drug_indicator,
		number_of_services,
		number_of_medicare_beneficiaries,
		number_of_distinct_medicare_beneficiary_per_day_services,
		average_medicare_allowed_amount,
		average_submitted_charge_amount,
		average_medicare_payment_amount,
		average_medicare_standardized_amount,
		year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProcs
JoinNppesFLAllPC, SelectProcs join(npi == SelectProcs@national_provider_identifier,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProc
JoinProc sink(input(
		licensure_status as string,
		national_provider_identifier as string,
		last_name as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		practice_location_address_state as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['temp_join.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	quoteAll: true) ~> Write2Blob
